When creating a chat you will have the possibility to choose more than one person and create a group.

keepInTouchWithColleagues: Keep in touch with your colleagues or join your groups' meeting rooms

virtual.emptyState: Virtual Rooms you create will be shown here.

participants.onlyUser: You are the only active participant.

virtual.startPrompt: Start a meeting in this Virtual Room.

modal.description: Give this Virtual Room a recognizable name so that your attendees know what they are expecting to meet about.

moderator.description: You will moderate this Virtual Room. The additional moderator will be added as collaborators with the same privileges.

recording.title: Recording
recording.description: The recording will be saved in the Files space of the moderator who started it.
recording.additionalDescription: If something goes wrong, the recording will be saved in the Files space of the moderator who started it.

snackbar.waitingInfo: There seems to be someone in the {{roomName}}'s waiting room.
snackbar.autoHandDown: It sounds like you’re saying something, so your hand will be lowered.

browserNotification.waitingMessage: New user is waiting to enter the meeting

waitingRoom.title: How do you want to join {{meetingName}} meeting?

waitingRoom.readyCaption: Everything is set! Make yourself comfortable.

feedback.caption: It helps us keep improving :)
feedback.description: Your opinion is important to us!

successSnackbar.participants: {{userName}} started the registration of this meeting

recordingStart.failureSnackbar: It is not possible to start the registration, please contact your system administrator.

recordingModal.title: Stop recording
recordingModal.description: You are going to stop the recording. You can start a new one at any time.

successSnackbar.stopper: You will find the recording in {{folderName}} as soon as it is available
successSnackbar.participants: {{userName}} stopped the registration of this meeting

recordingStop.failureSnackbar: It is not possible to stop the registration, please contact your system administrator.

modal.deleteGroupLabel: This action will affect all Group members and cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to delete this Group?

modal.deleteMessageTitleDescription: You're deleting the message, it will no longer be available
modal.deleteRoomLabel: Are you sure to delete this Room?
modal.deleteUserDescription: Are you sure you want to remove this member?

modal.leaveGroupLabel: Are you sure to leave this Group?

meetings.title: Meetings
meetings.description: Set your audio and video preferences to enter the meetings. You can always customize your preferences before joining every meeting.

recording.description: Set a custom folder where to save the recordings of the meetings you start.

export.caption: Exporting chats with a lot of content can take a while.
export.subHead: Choose one of your chats to export messages to a text file. Remember that you are responsible for how you use the exported data.
export.title: Chat export
export.description: During the export you can browse Carbonio without worries. However, if you refresh the page the export will be interrupted.

snackbar.success: Chat exported successfully, check your downloads!

placeholder.title: You can go to Chats and create a Virtual Room to host your appointment.
placeholder.description: You will find your Virtual Rooms here when you’re back.

virtual.managementHint: You can edit or delete your Virtual Rooms in the Chat module.

toBeMigrate.title: Duplicate to new Chats Module
toBeMigrate.description: This action creates a copy of the group, including its title, members, and moderator role.

modal.caption: Once the copy is complete, you will be automatically redirected to the new module.
modal.title: Create a copy of the group "{{roomName}}"
modal.subtitle: You are about to create a copy of the group in the new Chats module.
modal.warning: Important: You are copying the group and with it the title, members and moderator role. This action does not create a copy of the conversation history.

alreadyMigrate.title: This group is already duplicated
alreadyMigrate.description: Click the button to be redirected to the new module and use the duplicate of this group.

feedback.error: Something went wrong, please try again or reload the page.

toBeMigrate.description: This action converts this item into a group, copying its title, topic, members, and moderator role.
toBeMigrate.title: Convert to Group in new module
toBeMigrate.tooltip: There must be at least two members besides you.
toBeMigrate.moreMembersNeeded: To convert this item into a group, it must have at least two other members besides you.

modal.warning: Important: You are creating a new group that will have the same title, topic, members, and moderator role as the original item. However, this action does not create a copy of the conversation history.
modal.subtitle: You are about to convert this item to a group in the new Chats module.
modal.title: Convert "{{roomName}}" to a Group.
modal.caption: Once the conversion is complete, you will be automatically redirected to the new module.

alreadyMigrate.description: Click the button to be redirected to the new module and use the duplicate of this item.
alreadyMigrate.title: This item has already been converted

searchPanel.noResults: It looks like there are no results.
